short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PrivacyBison Audits Enterprise Web Applications for Cybersecurity and Privacy Risks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrivacyBison gives you an "outside-in" perspective of your web applications' Cybersecurity and Privacy Risks. 
Users can simply record their online transactions and use Privacy Bison's comprehensive controls to assess and sscore for critical Cybersecurity and Privacy risks.
PrivacyBison also allows Security, Risk and Compliance Analysts and Developers to consume the Metadata and Data of these Cybersecurity and Privacy controls totally through APIs. Think of us as a secure, online exchange of Cybersecurity and Privacy Risks Metadata. All absolutely free of cost.

Try it.  And, don't forget to give us your valuable feedback.
For more information, visit https://privacybison.com/howitworks
